text: 6.8: Jer 15.1-3; Ese 5.12; 5.17; 14.21; 33.27; Sek 6.3Ana maaŋ nzuaim, gu mbaram garav, gu hos ŋgurɨɨŋ tavuara gari. Mba hos ŋgurɨɨŋ tavuara perigi guma, ana zɨ khare, Vhɨzi. Gu gari, mba vhɨzgi gumgi gu mbigi ki ŋgu vhɨra mba guma zɨn zi. Mba ŋgu zɨ khare, Hedis. Fhe Bakɨme kha nuianan ki gumgi heeŋv mbe ndi fethɨgi phɨnin maanga ŋkasŋkar mani ga nɨɨŋgi. Mani mbe ndiv phɨnin maaŋgip, mani phɨna the, mani mbe shogirim, mbe vhɨzgirga. Mani ntara bakɨme khavgip ntari ga mbui kozan mba gumgi gu mbigi shogɨrim, mbe vhɨzɨrim, mani mba tivɨv, thir vhɨzɨrga tuga mbatɨgar mben nɨɨŋrim, mbe thir vhɨzɨv, mbe thari vhɨzgirga. Mani vhɨra rɨmrɨɨ bakɨvi ga sararim, nta zɨv, mben hɨv, mbe shogɨrim, mbe vhɨzgirga. Mani vhɨra kha nuianan ki ruaŋruaŋgi sɨgi ga sararim, nta zɨv, mbe shogɨrim, mbe vhɨzgirga.
